item.title: CVE-2013-2198|2024-08-06T15:27:41.103Z -- login%20security -- login%20security
item.description: The Login Security module 6.x-1.x before 6.x-1.3 and 7.x-1.x before 7.x-1.3 for Drupal allows attackers to bypass intended restrictions via a crafted username.
